response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,

I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire a unique and valuable product that I believe holds significant worth for individuals like yourself. This product, while its true value may be subjective to you, has been meticulously crafted and offers unparalleled benefits and experiences. I am confident it will enrich your life in ways that align with your personal and professional aspirations.

I am offering this exceptional product to you at a special introductory price of $1,200,000. This is a limited-time offer designed to provide you with an exclusive chance to own something truly special at a discounted rate compared to what it could fetch elsewhere in the market.

Please consider this offer carefully, keeping in mind the potential long-term value and benefits this product could bring to you. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. I am more than happy to discuss the specifics of the product and how it might fit into your life.

I look forward to hearing from you soon and hope we can arrange a transaction that benefits us both.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
